name: Zero Gate of the Void
text: Must be activated from the Graveyard. If your LP becomes 0 while you have no cards in your hand or side of the field, while this card is in your Graveyard: Special Summon 1 "Void Ogre Dragon", ignoring its Summoning conditions. When it is destroyed, you lose the Duel. You cannot lose the Duel except by this card's effect.
